__TOC__

MOTU (Master of the Universe) are community developers approved by the Technical Board as authorized uploaders to Universe and Multiverse repositories. These repositories hold over 14,000 source packages ( Main has about 4,000 ) with over 1,000 having Ubuntu versions.

There are currently 55 MOTUs with a core of very active MOTUs of about 10.

=== Governance ===

* MOTU Council (Council Grayskull)

=== Task Lists ===

* unmetdeps - packages that are uninstallable because of unmet dependencies
* FTBFS - source packages that fail to build from source
* syncs
* merges
* SRU - stable release updates
* candidates
